directives.name: QaiButtonBase

components.name: AppComponent
QaiBadge
QaiButton
components.description:
Use this component by adding the [qai-button] attribute on any button element.

Using an attribute instead of a custom element allows direct access to the native underlying element.
components.rawdescription:
Use this component by adding the `[qai-button]` attribute
 on any button element.

Using an attribute instead of a custom element allows direct access
 to the native underlying element.

components.name: QaiButtonAnchor
QaiHeading
components.selector:
h1[qai-heading], h2[qai-heading], h3[qai-heading],
    h4[qai-heading], h5[qai-heading], h6[qai-heading]
components.description:
Use this component by adding the [qai-heading] attribute on any heading element (h1–h6).

Using an attribute instead of a custom element allows direct access to the native underlying element.
components.rawdescription:
Use this component by adding the `[qai-heading]` attribute
 on any heading element (h1–h6).

Using an attribute instead of a custom element allows direct access
 to the native underlying element.
